tool_description: Do you live for the MegaMillions? Well, you’ve just found your match! Get the latest winning numbers and statistics for your game!
name: Mega Millions
title: Mega Millions

api_list.name: Drawings Between Dates
api_list.description: This endpoint takes in two dates and gives back all the winning numbers in between.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/2021-01-01/2021-02-01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/{date1}/{date2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: General Statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint pulls  statistics of the Mega Millions numbers. For each ball (denoted firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber, fourthNumber, fifthNumber, megaBall, megaplier) of the min, max, mean, median, mode, standard deviation, variance, sample variance, skewness, and kurtosis is calculated. Lastly, there is a frequency of occurrence list that shows how often each number has appeared in the result set.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check Ticket
api_list.description: Let's see if your ticket is a winner! This endpoint will look at the date of the requested drawing and the numbers on your ticket to determine if you are a winner.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/CheckTicket/2022-12-06/1/2/3/4/5/15"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/CheckTicket/{date}/{firstnumber}/{secondnumber}/{thirdnumber}/{fouthnumber}/{fifthnumber}/{megaball}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Drawing by Date
api_list.description: Allows the user to find the information on one drawing by using the data of the drawing in the yyyy-MM-dd format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/2010-02-02"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com/{drawingdate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mega-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
